name: JRS Innovation UG
description:
JRS Innovation is an IT company that designs, builds and operates IT systems and services for our clients. We offer IT solutions and services to improve efficiency, increase productivity and reduce costs.
JRS Innovation brings quality apps to iOS, Android, and Windows. We apply a fresh mindset and smart technology to exceed our customers' expectations. In addition to developing apps, we provide data integration, among other services, in order to enable mobile enterprise.

locations.address: Ganesh Marg, Surya Nagar, Gopalpura Bypass
